data.text:
Whatâs the name of that song? Shazam will identify music playing around you or in apps like TikTok, Instagram & YouTube. Discover live shows, song lyrics, videos & more. Over 2 billion installs and counting!

âShazam is an app that feels like magicâ - techradar.com

âShazam is a gift... a game changerâ - Pharrell Williams, GQ

âI donât know how we ever survived before Shazamâ - Marshmello

WHY YOUâLL LOVE IT

Find the name of any song. Even when youâre offline (the app will save it and find it when reconnected), using headphones or multi-tasking.

Identify music in an instant! Add Music Recognition to your Control Centre and enable the Lock Screen or Home Screen widget.

Discover live music events based on artist popularity, recommendations or search.

WHAT ELSE?

Listen and add to Apple Music playlists.

Follow along with time-synced lyrics.

Watch music videos in Apple Music or YouTube.

Find out what is popular in your country or city with Shazam charts.

Open any song directly in Apple Music, Spotify & Deezer.

THOUSANDS OF 5-STAR REVIEWS

âOMG... this app will blow your mind...you press the Shazam button and boom, you got the name of the song.â

âSo helpful in finding good and new music you truly love.â

âI literally find my song in 1 secondâ¦â

âI love Shazam...It is helping me build a great playlist of songs I dont recognise right off hand.â

âThis app is literally part of my daily routineâ¦â

âThis is the bestest app ever PEOPLE! If you want to know the name of a song or artist, this is the app you want.â

âLove the smooth integration to my Apple Music...â

âLove the lyrics section!!! The lyrics match the words of the songâ¦â

Availability and features may vary by country.

For more information on Shazamâs privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/.

Find out more and get support from AppleCare at

https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT210331

Anting1967 ,

Couldnât live without it.

I genuinely love this app. I loved Shazam before it was even an app, back in the olden days before smartphones existed when we had to call 2580 and play the music on the call and wait for the text. Before this we either had to call the radio or go to the record store to hum the tunes we liked in the with the faint hope someone would recognise it. So many amazing songs I only got to hear for a second time and only knew the names of because of this app. Great for when you hear songs you like on movies or tv shows, at parties or in the club, on the radio etc etc. I have discovered so many new bands that I love but never would of knew existed without Shazam, more than I ever discovered through paying for and reading music magazines. If you donât already know what Shazam is, Iâm 100% sure you will have already wished for the existence of such a service at some point. If you love music as much as I do, you really do need this AND ITâS ALL FREE!
